## Setup
```{r}
#|message: false

library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(janitor)
```

## Read Data
```{r}
#| message: false

lobster_abundance <- read_csv("../data/Lobster_Abundance_All_Years_20220829.csv")

```

```{r}
#| eval: false

colnames(lobster_abundance)
str(lobster_abundance)
glimpse(lobster_abundance)
summary(lobster_abundance)
```

## Cleaning data
```{r}
lobster_clean <- lobster_abundance %>% 
  mutate(SIZE_MM = na_if(SIZE_MM, -99999)) %>%
  clean_names()
```

## Subsetting data using `filter()`
```{r}
not_napl <- lobster_clean %>% 
  filter(site != "NAPL")

aque_70mm <- lobster_clean %>% 
  filter(site == "AQUE" | size_mm > 70)
```
